action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sleeping Girl: *Zzzzzzzz...* Monsters...Demons.. Ahh! Help! Help me!! I need protection!! Shawn: How can I protect you from your dreams? Sleeping Girl: I need... an axe...yes!! *zzzz* Bring me an axe *zzzz*"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*Whispers to Brad* What do we do now? Brad: Well, an axe is good for protection, but it's also pretty dangerous to sleep with."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Brad: Look a Fire Axe! Let's take this back to that sleepy girl"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sleeping Girl: Oh...mmmm...Thank you and good night."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*The door is locked* Brad: One time I saw a patient hide a key in a trash can around here. I wonder if it's still there..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "There wasn't anything in this trash can. Let's try another one."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*You found the key! Brad: See buddy! I knew we could find one. You're welcome."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sick Man: Thank you so much! *Gulp gulp gulp*"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sick Man: You there.. *cough cough* I feel so miserable. Why am I always sick? Shawn: You don't sound that bad. Sick Man: But I do, I've been constantly sick since I was 10 years old. What I really need is some cough medicine."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "*Whispers to Brad* What do we do now? Brad: He doesn't that sick, getting him medicine could just make things worse."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Brad: Hey this could be some of the cough medicine that that one sick guy wanted."
